text: Jozef Moravčík (born 19 March 1945) is a Slovak politician. He was the Prime Minister of Slovakia from 16 March 1994 to 13 December 1994. He later as the mayor of Bratislava from 1998 to 2002.Profile at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Czech Republic He was born in Očová, Slovak Republic. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Slovakia
title: Jozef Moravčík
